name: Orbitrary (maaz)
description:
It’s the year 2100, N4SA has finally figured out a way to manipulate the sun’s gravitational pull. We can now control the movement of other planets in the solar system along their orbits. 

However, unbeknownst to us this technology also poses a huge threat, it pulls in stray asteroids towards the Earth. 

As the lead N4SA scientist it is your duty to save Earth from impending doom by manipulating other planets to intercept these asteroids and destroy them before they reach earth!

Goodluck!

CONTROLS: 
  • WASD/ARROW KEYS - Change Orbits
  • SPACEBAR - Switch Cameras
  • J - Speed Up Planet
  • K - Slow Down Planet
  • ESC - Pause Game

CREDITS:

  • Game design and writing by Shrishti
  • All else done by Maaz
